product_name: Horny Toad Flanery Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're taking to the trails or hitting the road on a cool weekend, the soft organic cotton Horny Toad Flanery Shirt is an ideal companion. Organic cotton is grown without synthetic chemical fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides or defoliants, nor is it genetically modified in any way. 2 patch chest pockets. Straight hem. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're taking to the trails or hitting the road on a cool weekend, the soft organic cotton Horny Toad Flanery Shirt is an ideal companion.
